name: Super Iso Ball
description:
Explore and complete all the levels in the shortest time possible!

Super Iso Ball is a 3D isometric platform game that consists of collecting gems to complete the levels by controlling a ball.

It has fluid and fast controls.

Can you master them and complete the levels in the shortest time possible?

Try it and beat all the worlds and levels!

Issues?
Contact me via email at iaathdev@gmail.com
